channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft Word
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft Word

item.title: CVE-2018-8573|2024-08-05T07:02:25.938Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20word
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft Word software when it fails to properly handle objects in memory, aka "Microsoft Word Remote Code Execution Vulnerability." This affects Microsoft Word, Office 365 ProPlus, Microsoft Office. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2018-8539.

item.title: CVE-2018-8161|2024-08-05T06:46:13.792Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20word
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft Office software when the software fails to properly handle objects in memory, aka "Microsoft Office Remote Code Execution Vulnerability." This affects Microsoft Word, Word, Microsoft Office, Microsoft SharePoint. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2018-8157, CVE-2018-8158.

item.title: CVE-2018-8310|2024-08-05T06:54:36.417Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20word
item.description: A tampering vulnerability exists when Microsoft Outlook does not properly handle specific attachment types when rendering HTML emails, aka "Microsoft Office Tampering Vulnerability." This affects Microsoft Word, Microsoft Office.

item.title: CVE-2018-0950|2024-08-05T03:44:11.695Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20word
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists when Office renders Rich Text Format (RTF) email messages containing OLE objects when a message is opened or previewed, aka "Microsoft Office Information Disclosure Vulnerability." This affects Microsoft Word, Microsoft Office. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2018-1007.

item.title: CVE-2018-8430|2024-08-05T06:54:36.342Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20word
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft Word if a user opens a specially crafted PDF file, aka "Word PDF Remote Code Execution Vulnerability." This affects Microsoft Word, Microsoft Office.
